sourcesContent:
import { Component, signal } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { ProjectService } from '@app/core/services'; import { ConsultingInquiry } from '@app/core/models'; import { ProjectType } from '@app/core/models/project.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hire', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], templateUrl: './hire.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hire.component.scss'] }) export class HireComponent { inquiry: ConsultingInquiry = { name: '', email: '', type: 'Architecture', message: '' }; engagementTypes: ProjectType[] = ['Architecture', 'DevOps', 'Migration']; highLoad = signal(true); constructor(private projectService: ProjectService) {} submitInquiry(): void { const newProject = { name: `${this.inquiry.type} Strategy`, client: this.inquiry.name, type: this.inquiry.type, description: this.inquiry.message, stack: ['Planning', 'TBD'], status: 'Pending' as const, architecture: 'Under Review' }; this.projectService.addProject(newProject); alert(`Contract Initialized for ${this.inquiry.name}. Deployment pipeline started.`); this.inquiry = { name: '', email: '', type: 'Architecture', message: '' }; } }

Consulting Engagement

{{ highLoad() ? 'High Load - Waitlist' : 'Available for engagement' }}

New Engagement

Core Services

Architecture Design

Domain-driven design, event-driven architectures, and system scalability patterns.

Microservices

Service isolation, API design, distributed tracing, and resilience patterns.

DevOps & Infrastructure

Kubernetes orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure-as-code, and cloud platforms.

Technical Mentorship

Team coaching, engineering best practices, and technology roadmapping.

Typical Response

Responses to inquiries within 24-48 business hours

hours
